parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of items returned

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: Run a match query in the fields of the items, only specific fields are allowed Date values should be in the ISO format, i.e. `2017-01-01` or `2017-01-01T22:00:00`

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the items on the specified field and order. i.e. name=1 to sort items in ascending order based on their name.
